label: Plot
comment: A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
The indication of whether or not this crop plot is certified as regulatory organic.
The code specifying the type of regulatory soil for this crop plot.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.

objectProperties.comment: An agricultural process crop production applicable for this field crop.
A specified agricultural application applied to this agricultural zone area.
The area measure for this crop plot.
A field crop grown on this crop plot.
An agricultural certificate specified for this crop plot.
An agricultural characteristic specified for this crop plot.
An agricultural zone area specified for this crop plot.
A referenced location specified for this material.

referencedBy.comment: A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.
A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.
The plot where this field crop is grown.
